summary: The Australian bitcoin miner expects to start trading on the Nasdaq Nov. 19 under the ticker symbol IREN.
title: Bitcoin Miner Iris Energy Upsizes Its IPO, Valuing Company at $1.5B
content: Iris Energy, a Sydney-based company that mines bitcoin primarily with renewable energy, raised its initial public offering (IPO) pricing to $28 per share from the previous expected range of $25 to $27.
Read more: Crypto Miners Hoarding Bitcoins as Price Surges Above $55K
